name: Ninjoe In The Dragon's Lair
description:
Ninjoe has fallen into the dragon's lair. Normally, the dragon is a pretty nice person, but unfortunately it was cursed to prevent anything that enters its lair from ever leaving. Help Ninjoe get out of there.

- Jump on enemies to defeat them
- Pick up keys to open doors
- If you die, you will reappear at the start of the level as long as you have at least 10 coins
- Drop-in drop-out multiplayer for up to 8 players (It may not be a good idea to play with more than 4, but the option's there)
Press O/Z to add a player or UP to remove yourself from the game
